citations.narrative:
During this inspection it was noted that the back wall of the animals shelter was in disrepair. There were 2 -3 boards
missing from the back wall. To ensure the animals are protected from injury this shelter will need to be addressed.
*** To Be Corrected By: June 11, 2022

During this inspection it was noted that there were pieces of baling twine, a hay fork, and degrading blue tarp in the
animal enclosure. To ensure that the animals are not injured on these items they will need to be removed from the
animals enclosure.
***To Be Corrected By: May 5, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
During this inspection it was noted that the back wall of the animals shelter was in disrepair. There were 2 -3 boards 
missing from the back wall. To ensure the animals are protected from injury this shelter will need to be addressed. 
*** To Be Corrected By: June 11, 2022 
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
During this inspection it was noted that there were pieces of baling twine, a hay fork, and degrading blue tarp in the 
animal enclosure. To ensure that the animals are not injured on these items they will need to be removed from the 
animals enclosure. 
***To Be Corrected By: May 5, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
End Section
